Vertex



class Vertex;
Author:
Harry Allen

Date:
September 20, 2014

Class that represents a vertex within a graph.

this();
Default constructor

this(string key);
Constructor that initializes the vertex's key with the accepted string.

Params:
string key the key for the new vertex

bool isMarked();
Returns:
true is the vertex has been marked and false otherwise.

int getIndex();
Returns:
The index of the vertex

string getKey();
Returns:
The key of the vertex

int getNumEdge();
Returns:
The number of edges the vertex contains

Edge getEdge(int index);
Returns:
The edge corresponding to index.

Params:
int index the index of te edge to be returned

void setKey(string key);
Sets the vertex's key to the given string

Params:
string key the vertex's new key

void setMarked(bool marked);
Sets the bool that indicates that the vertex has been marked.

Params:
bool marked bool indicating whether the vertex has been marked

void setIndex(int i);
Sets the vertex's index to the given int

Params:
int i the vertex's new index

void addEdge(Edge E);
Adds an edge to the vertex.

Params:
Edge E new edge to add to the vertex
